data.text: @derryjournal It is unrealistic  to expect sick patients to be patient you doctors need to realise that important fact  don't make people your scapegoats, take it out on https://t.co/IATDqZerUO surgeries need to reopen then watch presentations reduce a lot.
@derryjournal Maybe if local GP surgeries got back to normal practice and ceased the daily Appointment lottery draw, people wouldn't be turning up to A&E with every ailment going.
@derryjournal Difficult to expect patients waiting for cancer treatment to be patient.
